name: Stichting IHE Delft
goal:
Vision UNESCO-IHE: The UNESCO-IHE Institute for Water Education envisions a world in which people manage their water resources sustainably and in which all sectors of society, particularly the poor, can enjoy the benefits of basic water services. Through generating and sharing excellent and novel knowledge, training the future water leaders, establishing networks and building capacity all over the world.
Mission Statement
The mission of the Institute is to contribute to the education and training of professionals and to build the capacity of sector organizations, knowledge centres and other institutions active in the fields of water, the environment and infrastructure in developing countries and countries in transition.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Development, Education, Environment, External Relations, Information Society, Research and Technology
